name: The_Chaos_Cube
description:
Summary:

Run, don't Stop!

Find the 3 glowing keys and rush to the exit.

Please for your own safety don't stop running:

(Controller is highly recommended if you use a sensitive mouse)

Controls:

L shift  / R-Trigger = sprint

AWSD / Left Joystck = move

LeftMouseClick / L Trigger = Use Hook

Spacebar / A/X = Jump

Team:

Aaron: https://github.com/AaronCG01

Sebas: https://github.com/archspit

Fer: https://github.com/Fer-Rodriguez

Majo: https://github.com/MajoBurguete

Adrian: https://github.com/AdrianValdes0331

Install instructions

For MacOS try doing this before executing the .app

1. Open Terminal 

 2. cd to the *.app folder 

 3. xattr -rc *.app 

 4. Double-click, it

For Windows, just download the zip and run the app.
